text: Wendell Lewis Willkie (born Lewis Wendell Willkie; February 18, 1892 â€“ October 8, 1944) was an American lawyer, corporate executive, and politician. He was the unsuccessful 1940 Republican nominee for President of the United States running against President Franklin D. Roosevelt. ==References== Category:1892 births Category:1944 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Lawyers from Indiana Category:Businesspeople from New York City Category:Businesspeople from Indiana Category:Politicians from Indiana Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from New York City
